channel.title: Selected Bilbiography on Sarah Allen Reed, Goblin Queen.

item.title: Editorial Roles, Columns, And Other Writings
item.description: Editorial Positions 3moon Magazine Art Director 2021-2022 BLACKWORK Editor and Publisher 2015-present Regular Appearances inxcomic (Greg Russell, editor) Issues 5-11 2020-2021 Anthology Pieces/Magazine Appearances Sleeping Village “Let The Waves Have Their Way: On Interpol And Black Metal” 2020 Zine Panique! (Yann Plane, editor) “La Vie Tragique De Monsieur Ducky” magazine Zine Panique #1 2020 Drawing Power: Women’s Stories Of Sexual Violence, Harassment, And Survival (Diane Noomin, editor) “Blame”
